DOC.brief_summary: Edema control ankle- hindfoot fracture important . Multi-layer compression bandage A-V Impulse compression may effective reduce edema ice .
DOC.detailed_description: After ankle- hindfoot fracture , edema major impact time point surgical intervention may increase risk wound complication infection postoperatively . Effective treatment edema , therefore , great importance . The aim study evaluate efficacy multi-layer compression therapy A-V Impulse compression ( AVI ) reduce ankle- hindfoot edema compare standard treatment ice .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Age 1865 year Inpatients Acute ankle hindfoot fracture ( malleolar , calcaneus , talus , pilon tibial fracture ) include fracture temporary stabilize external fixator ) No walk aid trauma Written inform consent Monotrauma Preoperative and/or postoperative edema Preoperative inclusion delay surgery due ankle edema fracture stable enough temporary removal orthesis Exclusion criterion : Diabetes Mellitus Lymphedema Peripheral arterial occlusive disease ( PAD ) Decompensated heart failure renal insufficiency Acute bacterial infection Severe osteoporosis Pathological fracture Known tumor Postthrombotic syndrome Thrombosis Open fracture Polytrauma , cerebral trauma Neurological deficiency Diuretics Pregnancy Alcohol drug abuse Psychological disorder
